"The game is simple, I'll put you on the ground, and you run. I'll try to crush you with my giant feet the whole time. Obviously, if I get you, you're dead. As he ran, something suddenly flew right over him. Before he knew it, Daisy's colorful sock landed right in front of him. As the tiny human started to back up, the other landed on top of him. It smelled like the forest, with a hint of strawberries, which was Daisy's favorite treat. Damon started to climb out, when he felt a tremor. He slowly looked back to see his sister smiling at him.

He was heading towards a table, even though Daisy could crawl under, he felt she would have trouble staying with him. Damon was almost there when a large shadow was over him.

"No, Daisy please!" He screamed, afraid of her ending the game. Not only was he scared of her killing him, he was also really annoyed that his voice had come back at the worst time ever. Despite what he thought though, Daisy wasn't ready to finish up yet. Instead, she stepped in front of him, blocking his path. Without thinking, he looked up between her legs. Even though her shorts clearly covered her up, Damon became embarrassed of where he was looking.

"Where are you going to go? No matter where you step, I'll just block you. I learned from the best after all." She said, making Damon face-palm. The thing was, she was referring to him, as in, he taught her how to block bugs from getting away. He also taught her how to tease them, and how to sound like a hero. info.brief_description: Damon finds himself in trouble when he's shrunk around his three sisters and mother!
info.description:
A Little Problem

When Damon finds himself shrunk in his own household, he finds that the things that are commonplace in his everyday life are now life-threatening obstacles! He must compete with the deadly company of his sisters (whether or not they notice him) and his mother. But will it be too late by the time Damon is found? Is there anyway his affliction can be reversed?

Characters:

Damon Love (17) (Protagonist)

Damon Love is a young man of seventeen who lives with his three sisters and mother. His dad left when he was small, so he's been around females all his life. He goes to Saint Nicholas High School and is considered a bit of a geek. However, he is very close to his family. He's 6'0 with scruffy brown hair and green eyes.

Tanya Love (41) (Mother)

Tanya works as an accountant and provides for her four children. Her husband left after her youngest child, Daisy was born and has not sought a lover ever since. She has shoulder length blonde hair that just tickles her generous cleavage. She's got a motherly shape about her, with large bouncing breasts and a firm, big ass. She always wears make up and is an absolute bombshell of a woman.

Freya Love (19) (Older Sister)

Freya is like the second mother of the Love family. She has her mothers jiggling 36F boobs and an ass that is firm and strong, but not as large as her Mom's. She has shoulder length, wavy brown hair and dazzling blue eyes. Freya has a secret diaper fetish that she's never disclosed to any of her family, but keeps a diaper stash and dummy under her bed.

Sarah Love (16) (Twin Sister)

Sarah is the beautiful middle sister of the Love family. She has blonde hair like her mother but her breasts are a modest C-cup, and her ass is peachy, but nowhere near as big as Freya's or her mother's. She has a good relationship with Damon, but as with all siblings they have their rough patches. Sarah also happens to be a science buff, and is starting a chemistry degree at sixteen years old. She loves to experiment.

Daisy Love (14) Younger Sister)

Daisy is the sweet, innocent little sister of the Love family. She has long brown hair up in a ponytail and has big, beautiful blue eyes. She's a very adventurous girl, and loves to get dirty and filthy. She looks up to Damon and has a lot of respect for her big brother. (Or little, as the case may be)

Rules

#1: No male on male content. I'm all for Futanari stuff, but there's no male characters in this story for a reason, sorry!

#2: All giantess, shrink, vore, anal vore, unbirthing, piss, shit, feet etc. are encouraged! But try and give your chapters reason and your plots meaning. (Which leads me onto #3)

#3: Write your chapters properly. aNy chptrs wich r ritten lyk thys wil be DELETED! All devices have spellcheck these days, use it! Also, no ridiculously short chapters unless necessary. People don't like to read tiny useless chapters.


Well, that's all from me! There aren't any content restrictions on this story apart from what you've already seen above. Please enjoy the stories that emerge, I won't be too harsh with my moderating. Enjoy writing!

Many thanks,
